name: CR BOM Costing
query:
SELECT
`tabBOM`.name as "BOM:Link/BOM:180",
`tabItem`.process_no as "PNo:Data:40",
`tabBOM`.item_name as "Item Name:Link/Item:230",
`tabBOM Item`.item_name as "Input Item:Link/Item:160",
`tabBOM Item`.qty as "Input qty:Float:70",
`tabBOM`.raw_material_cost as "Rate:Float:80",
`tabBOM`.operating_cost as "Opera Cost:Float:80",
`tabBOM`.total_cost as "Total Cost:Float:80"

FROM
`tabBOM`,
`tabBOM Item`,
`tabItem`

WHERE
`tabBOM`.name=`tabBOM Item`.parent &&
`tabItem`.item_name=`tabBOM`.item_name &&
`tabItem`.rollon_code = %(rollon_code)s
ORDER BY `tabItem`.process_no DESC,`tabBOM`.name DESC
